data.name: CurrencyConversion_TestAction.SqlScript
data.value: SELECT BillingDocument, BillingDocumentItem FROM edw.vw_BillingDocumentItem_s4h GROUP BY BillingDocument, BillingDocumentItem HAVING COUNT(*) <> 4

data.name: notEmpty_TestAction.SqlScript
lgc_InOutIDInIsNotFalse_TestAction.SqlScript
data.value:
/* Add SQL statements here to exercise the database object that you want to test.
To test a stored procedure, invoke it here by adding an EXEC statement that has appropriate parameters.
In the lower pane, you can add test conditions that verify whether the results of your SQL statements match what you expect. */
--17.06.2022 FB: This test verifies that any customers marked as Inside don't match the --definition of InOutID.
WITH A AS ( SELECT InOutID, SoldToParty FROM edw.vw_BillingDocumentItem_s4h WHERE InOutID = 'I' )
SELECT * FROM A WHERE LEFT(SoldToParty, 2) NOT IN ('IP', 'IC')

data.name: sum_BaseAndEDWNetAmountAreEqual_TestAction.SqlScript
data.value:
/* Add SQL statements here to exercise the database object that you want to test.
To test a stored procedure, invoke it here by adding an EXEC statement that has appropriate parameters.
In the lower pane, you can add test conditions that verify whether the results of your SQL statements match what you expect. */
--FB 17.06.2022: This test verifies that the Net Invoiced Sales in local currency is the --same between base and EDW for items which are not marked as return.
WITH A AS ( SELECT sum(NetAmount) as NetAmount FROM base_s4h_cax.C_BillingDocumentItemBasicDEX WHERE ReturnItemProcessingType <> 'X' )
, B AS ( SELECT sum(NetAmount) as NetAmount FROM edw.vw_BillingDocumentItem_s4h WHERE CurrencyType = 'Transaction Currency' AND ReturnItemProcessingType <> 'X' )
SELECT NetAmount FROM A
EXCEPT
SELECT NetAmount FROM B

data.name: cnt_BaseAndEDWAreEqual_TestAction.SqlScript
data.value:
/* Add SQL statements here to exercise the database object that you want to test.
To test a stored procedure, invoke it here by adding an EXEC statement that has appropriate parameters.
In the lower pane, you can add test conditions that verify whether the results of your SQL statements match what you expect. */
--FB 17.06.2022: This test verifies that the same amount of records exist in base and edw for --transaction currency.
WITH A AS ( SELECT count(*) as Cnt FROM base_s4h_cax.C_BillingDocumentItemBasicDEX )
, B AS ( SELECT count(*) as Cnt FROM edw.vw_BillingDocumentItem_s4h WHERE CurrencyType = 'Transaction Currency' )
SELECT Cnt FROM A
EXCEPT
SELECT Cnt FROM B
